```{r data import}

data
numericalData = subset(data, select = -c(Sex, ChestPainType, RestingECG, ExerciseAngina,ST_Slope))
numericalData

```

```{r helperFunctions}
numberOfOccurences = function(vector, SearchTerm){
  total = 0
  for (i in vector){
    if (i == SearchTerm){
      total = total + 1
    }
  }
  return (total)
}

numberOfLessThan = function(vector, value){
  total = 0
  for(i in vector){
    if (i < value){
      total = total+1
    }
  }
  return (total)
}
```
